com.interpss.common.util

Class IpssLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.common.util.IpssLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpssMsgListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class IpssLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements IpssMsgListener
    InterPSS platform Logger implementation. The logger is a IpssMsgListener, could be used for logging InterPSS platform mess
